bio: Hello! I am a fan of the artist
contributionDescription: Hello! I am a fan of the artist. Hopefully this small contribution will be a driving force for the NFT market to develop more. Artists and OP together achieve new achievements for the future. I hope to receive investment from the project to promote and support artists.

contributionLinks.description: I use OP as a payment tool to support artists.

impactDescription: I have linked 31 artists and own 254 collections for myself. So I want to be able to connect more with other artists in the future. Help many artists have motivation for better personal and community development. From there, it can attract more members and users to know about future music projects
pwFlaggedReason: The application should be flagged for promising future impact and potential advertising, as the applicant talks about hoping to promote and support artists in the future which falls into a promise of future deliverables or impact and could be seen as using the application to showcase artists they support.
